meanings.definition: To make a buzzing or humming noise.
meanings.sent1: The bees bombinated around the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The old refrigerator bombinated loudly in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The bombinated sound of the fan put me to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The city bombinated with activity as people rushed to work.
meanings.sent5: The bombinated drone of the airplane filled the sky.

meanings.sent1: The mosquito bombinated annoyingly in my ear.
meanings.sent2: The electric wires bombinated softly in the background.
meanings.sent3: The bombinated sound of the toy robot made the kids giggle.
meanings.sent4: The bombinated chatter of the crowd filled the stadium.
meanings.sent5: The bombinated engine of the car signaled its approach.
